about_the_game:
Add Senjo no OkamiⅡ to your Capcom Arcade Stadium game line-up!

In the year 19XX, a group of revolutionaries launch a coup against the government of the R country. The former U.S.
president, in R for disarmament talks, is caught in the crossfire and kidnapped by the rebels. Now the mercenaries of Wolf Force are the only ones who can save the former president!

Players: 1-3 Player Co-Op
Genre: Shooter
Versions: Japanese
